briefdescription.para: Set inv mass diagonal matrix of a given body. Overwrites the computed values.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_PutBodyInvMass(ibdyty, inv_mass)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of RBDY2
inv_mass
(double array) : inv_mass of RBDY2 (size 3)

memberdef.argsstring: (int ivalue1, int ivalue2, double *rvector_in, int rlength_in)
memberdef.name: RBDY2_PutBodyPreconW

briefdescription.para: Put preconW of a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_PutBodyPreconW(ibdyty, idof, W)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of RBDY2
idof
(integer) : corresponding dof to set
W
(double array) :

briefdescription.para: Set a vector of a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
Possible values for datatype field are:
"Coor0": reference coordinates
"Coorb": coordinates at beginning of time step
"Coor_": coordinates in computed configuration
"X____": cumulated displacements over time in computed configuration
"Xbeg_": cumulated displacements over time at beginning of time step
"V____": velocity in computed configuration
"Vbeg_": velocity at beginning of time step
"Vaux_": working array for velocity
"Vfree": velocity free of contacts
"Reac_": contact reaction force
"Raux_": working array for reaction force
"Ireac": contact impulse
"Iaux_": working array for impulste
"Fext_": external forces
Uses copy, and in case fo Fext, the operation is not just setting but adding

usage : RBDY2_PutBodyVector(datatype, ibdyty, vector)
datatype
(string of size 5) : the vector to set
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of body
vector
(double array) : the new value

briefdescription.para: Put an array of a vector of all RBDY2 bodies (visible and invisible)

detaileddescription.para: Possible values for datatype field are: ... see RBDY2_PutBodyVector

python usage : RBDY2_PutAllBodyVector(datatype, matrix)
datatype
(string [5]) : the vector to set
matrix
(double array) : input matrix

briefdescription.para: Get a copy of a vector of a given RBDY2 body.

detaileddescription.para:
Possible values for datatype field are:
"Coor0": reference coordinates
"Coorb": coordinates at beginning of time step
"Coorm": coordinates in detection configuration
"Coor_": coordinates in computed configuration
"X____": cumulated displacements over time in computed configuration
"Xbeg_": cumulated displacements over time at beginning of time step
"V____": velocity in computed configuration
"Vbeg_": velocity at beginning of time step
"Vaux_": working array for velocity
"Vfree": velocity free of contacts
"Reac_": contact reaction force
"Raux_": working array for reaction force
"Ireac": contact impulse
"Iaux_": working array for impulste
"Fext_": external forces
"Fint_": internal forces

usage : vector = RBDY2_GetBodyVector(datatype, ibdyty)
datatype
(string of size 5) : the vector to get
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered body
vector
(double array) : the desired vector

briefdescription.para: Get an array of a vector of all RBDY2 bodies (visible and invisible)

detaileddescription.para: Possible values for datatype field are: ... see RBDY2_GetBodyVector

python usage : matrix = RBDY2_GetBodyVector(datatype, ibdyty)
datatype
(string [5]) : the vector to get
matrix (double array) : output matrix

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer on a vector of a given RBDY2 body.

detaileddescription.para:
Possible values for datatype field are:
"Coor0": reference coordinates
"Xbeg_": cumulated displacements over time at beginning of time step
"X____": cumulated displacements over time in computed configuration
"Vbeg_": velocity at beginning of time step
"V____": velocity in computed configuration
"Vaux_": working array for velocity
"Ireac": contact impulse
"Iaux_": working array for impulste
"Fext_": external forces

usage : vector_ptr = RBDY2_GetPtrVector(datatype, ibdyty)
datatype
(string of size 5) : the vector to get
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered body
vector_ptr
(double array) : reference on the desired vector viewed as a numpy array

briefdescription.para: Get the inertia of a given RBDY2 body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : inertia = RBDY2_GetBodyInertia(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered body
inertia
(double) : the inertia of desired body

briefdescription.para: Get the inertia of a all RBDY2 body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : inertia = RBDY2_GetAllInertia()
inertia
(double array): the inertia of all bodies

briefdescription.para: increment values at the current time step (prediction)

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_IncrementStep()

briefdescription.para: Override the value of an existing velocity driven dof ; use after IncrementStep.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_SetVlocyDrivenDof(ibdyty, idrvdof, value)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered
idrvdof
(integer) : index of velocity driven dof to set
value
(real) : new value of the velocity driven dof

briefdescription.para: Compute current DOF of bodies in container.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_ComputeDof()

briefdescription.para: set current DOF as initial DOF of bodies in container

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_UpdateDof()

briefdescription.para: Compute free velocity of bodies in container.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_ComputeFreeVelocity()

briefdescription.para: Compute impulse of external forces of bodies in container.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_ComputeFext()

briefdescription.para: Compute impulse of internal forces of bodies in container.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_ComputeBulk()

briefdescription.para: check if all the RBDY2 rich an equilibrium state (velocity is almost equal to zero)

detaileddescription.para: usage : isBalanced = RBDY2_CheckEquilibriumState()

simplesect.para: isBalanced (boolean) : True if in equilibrium state

briefdescription.para: set bodies with ghost behaviour nickname as invisible

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_GhostToInvisible()

briefdescription.para: Nullify body current and initial velocities of a list of bodies.

detaileddescription.para: This keyword must be between the ComputeDof and UpdateDof ones.

usage : RBDY2_FatalDamping(i_list)
i_list
(list of integer) : list of bodies to reset current velocity if omitted works on all objetcs

briefdescription.para: Limit body velocity to Vmax value.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_PartialDamping(nb_steps, Vmax)
nb_steps
(integer) : periodicity @parma[in] Vmax (double) : Vmax

briefdescription.para: Write ascii DOF.LAST file.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_WriteLastDof()

briefdescription.para: Write ascii DOF.OUT file. Can be activated only each N steps.

detaileddescription.para: If 0 for ivalue1 and ivalue2, dofs of all bodies are written.

usage : RBDY2_WriteOutDof(ivalue1=0, ivalue2=0)
ivalue1
(integer) : first body
ivalue2
(integer) : last body

briefdescription.para: Display bodies degrees of freedom.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_DisplayOutDof()

briefdescription.para: Write ascii Rnod.LAST file.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_WriteLastRnod()

briefdescription.para: Write ascii Rnod.OUT file. Can be activated only each N steps.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_WriteOutRnod()

briefdescription.para: display body forces

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_DisplayOutRnod()

briefdescription.para: Write BODIES.OUT file.

detaileddescription.para: Write DRV_DOF.OUT file.
usage : RBDY2_WriteBodies()
usage : RBDY2_ClearedWriteBodies()

briefdescription.para: Read BODIES.DAT file.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_ReadBodies()
Initialize existing_entities variable in RBDY2 Adds the number of found bodies to entity

briefdescription.para: Read DOF file.

detaileddescription.para: If num <= 0 : DATBOX/DOF.INI file is read Else : OUTBOX/DOF.OUT.num is read, num being the parameter used in TimeEvolution_ReadIniDof last call

usage : RBDY2_ReadIniDof(num=0)
num
(integer) : which DOF file to read

briefdescription.para: Read DRV_DOF.DAT file.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_ReadDrivenDof()

briefdescription.para: Load bulk behaviour id from bulk_behav module.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_LoadBehaviours()

briefdescription.para: Load extra physical behaviour read in BULK_BEHAV.DAT file.

detaileddescription.para: Must be used with THERMO_RIGID ELECTRO_RIGID THERMO_ELECTRO_RIGID behaviours

usage : RBDY2_MP_LoadBehaviours(disper)
disper
(double) : dispersion variable

briefdescription.para: update surface energy with temperature

detaileddescription.para: Must be used with THERMO_RIGID ELECTRO_RIGID THERMO_ELECTRO_RIGID behaviours
usage : RBDY2_UpdateWSvsT()

briefdescription.para: update surface energy with time

detaileddescription.para: Must be used with THERMO_RIGID ELECTRO_RIGID THERMO_ELECTRO_RIGID behaviours
usage : RBDY2_UpdateWSvsTime()

briefdescription.para: Compute mass and inertia of bodies.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_ComputeMass()

briefdescription.para: define the space is X periodic [0,periode]

detaileddescription.para: The X variable reaches a value between 0 and periode

usage : RBDY2_SetPeriodicCondition(periode)
period
(double) : periode

briefdescription.para: resize body radius by a factor

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_ResizeBodies(homo)
homo
(double) : resize factor

briefdescription.para: Set displacements equal to 0.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_NullifyDisplacements()

briefdescription.para: Set velocity to 0.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_NullifyVelocities()

usage : RBDY2_SetSourcePoint(ibdyty, radius, x_coor, y_coor)
ibdyty
(integer): rank of first invisible body
radius
(double) : radius of source point area
x_coor

y_coor

briefdescription.para: check if it possible to deposit a new particle

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_CheckSourcePoint()

usage : RBDY2_MembraneBiaxialLoading(down, up, thickness, stress)
down
(integer) : rank of the lower body
up
(integer) : rank of the upper body
thickness
(double) : thickness of the membrane
stress
(double) : pressure on the membrane

memberdef.argsstring: (int down, double f_down, int right, double f_right, int up, double f_up, int left, double f_left)
memberdef.name: RBDY2_BiaxialLoading

briefdescription.para: Biaxial load of a sample using a rigid box.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_BiaxialLoading(down,f_down,right,f_right,up,f_up,left,f_left)

(integer) : rank of the lower body
f_down

right
(integer) : rank of the right body
f_right
(double) : pressure on the right body
up
(integer) : rank of the upper body
f_up
(double) : pressure on the upper body
left
(integer) : rank of the left body
f_left
(double) : pressure on the left body

briefdescription.para: define the boundary of command CHECK_OUT_OF_BOUNDS

usage : RBDY2_SetYmaxBoundary(up_boundary)
up_boundary
(double) : superior boundary value

briefdescription.para: define the boundary of command CHECK_OUT_OF_BOUNDS

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_SetXminBoundary(left_boundary)
left_boundary
(double) : left boundary value

briefdescription.para: define the boundary of command CHECK_OUT_OF_BOUNDS

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_SetXmaxBoundary(right_boundary)
right_boundary
(double) : right boundary value

briefdescription.para: Initialization of data for the equilibrium state check.

detaileddescription.para:
You must precise the type of check test :
Qvlcy : quadratic norm velocy
Mvlcy : maximum norm velocy

usage : RBDY2_CheckEquilibrium(norm_type , tolerance)
norm_type
(string of size 5) : norm type use for the equilibrium check
tolerance
(double) : norm tolerance

briefdescription.para: Create a new BODIES.OUT file as combination of the last one and of the last DOF.OUT file.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_AddDof2InBodies()

briefdescription.para: usage : RBDY2_InitFreeBoundary(xmin, xmax, radius)
usage : RBDY2_UpdateThermalStrain()
Get the number of RBDY2.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : nb_rbdy2 = RBDY2_GetNbRBDY2()
nb_rbdy2
(integer) : number of RBDY2 in container

briefdescription.para: Get the area (2D volume equivalent) of a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : area = GetBodyArea(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of the body
area
(double) : area

briefdescription.para: Get the area of a all body (visible and invisible)

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : area = RBDY2_GetAllArea()
area (double array) : masses of all RBDY2

briefdescription.para: Compute norms used to check if a part of the sample is in a equilibrium state.

detaileddescription.para: Compute norms used to test if there is an equilibrium state between abs_min and abs_max
Usefull in case of silos to access norms used to decide if the arch research must be activated

usage : Qnorm, Mnorm = RBDY2_CheckPartialEquilibriumState(abs_min, abs_max)
abs_min
(double) : min abscisse of sub domaine tested
abs_max
(double) : max abscisse of sub domaine tested
Qnorm
(double) : quadratric norm of the velocities of the grains
Mnorm
(double) : quadratric norm of the velocities of the grains

briefdescription.para: Check if a part of the sample is in a equilibrium state.

detaileddescription.para: Test if there is an equilibrium state between abs_min and abs_max
Usefull in case of silos to decide if the arch research must be activated

usage : isPartiallyEquilibriumed = RBDY2_CheckPartialEquilibriumState(abs_min, abs_max)
abs_min
(double) : min abscisse of sub domaine tested
abs_max
(double) : max abscisse of sub domaine tested
isPartiallyEquilibriumed
(boolean) : true if at partial equlibrium state, else false

briefdescription.para: Set a list of body to invisible state.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_SetBodiesInvisible(list_bdy)
list_bdy
(integer array) : list of rank of bodies of the container

briefdescription.para: return if a body visible

detaileddescription.para:
usage : visible = RBDY2_IsVisible(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of body
visible
(integer) : 1 if body is visible, 0 else

briefdescription.para: Get the mass of a body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : mass = RBDY2_GetBodyMass(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of desired body
mass
(double) : mass of body

briefdescription.para: Get the mass of a all body (visible and invisible)

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : masses = RBDY2_GetAllMass()
masses (double array) : masses of all RBDY2

briefdescription.para: Compute the position of bodies.

detaileddescription.para: usage : RBDY2_CompCoor()

briefdescription.para: Get the density of a body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage density = RBDY2_GetBodyDensity(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of the RBDY2 in container
density
(double) : density of the RBDY2

briefdescription.para: get the number of contactor of RBDY2

detaileddescription.para: python usage : nb = RBDY2_GetNbContactor(ibdyty)

parameterdescription.para: (integer) : rank of the RBDY2 in container

simplesect.para: nb (integer) : number of contactor attached to a RBDY2

briefdescription.para: Get the type of the first contactor of a body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage type = RBDY2_GetContactorType(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of the RBDY2 in container
type (string) : type of the first contactor of the body

detaileddescription.para:
usage color = RBDY2_GetContactorColor(ibdyty,itacty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of the RBDY2 in container
itacty
(integer) : rank of the contactor in the RBDY2
color (string) : color of the contactor of the body

briefdescription.para: Set the color of a given contactor of a body.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : RBDY2_SetContactorColor(ibdyty, itacty, color)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of the RBDY2
itacty
(integer) : rank of the contactor in the RBDY2
color
(string of size 5) : the color

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer onto the mass matrix of a body.
Get the velocity of a body.
Get the driven dof of a body.

ibdyty
(integer) : index of the RBDY2

(integer array) : indices list of driven dof
drvdof_values
(real array) : values of the driven dof

briefdescription.para: Compute the value of the driven velocity of a body a current time.

detaileddescription.para: In place replacement in the input array of the new value(s) of the driven velocity

python usage : RBDY2_computeDrvVlocy(ibdyty, values)
ibdyty
(integer) : index of the RBDY2
values
(double array) : numpy array, input old values of imposed velocity, output new ones

briefdescription.para: Set a given body as visible.

python usage : RBDY2_SetVisible(ibdyt)
ibdyty
(integer) : index of the RBDY2

briefdescription.para: Set a given body as invisible.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : RBDY2_SetInvisible(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : index of the RBDY2

briefdescription.para: allows to (re)activate a given vlocydrivendof (i.e. which has been declared in preprocessing)

python usage : RBDY2_SetVisibleVlocyDrivenDof(ibdyty, iccdof)
ibdyty(integer)
: index of the RBDY2
iccdof(integer)
: index of the DOF to set visible

briefdescription.para: allows to deactivate a given vlocydrivendof (i.e. which has been declared in preprocessing)

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : RBDY2_SetInvisibleVlocyDrivenDof(ibdyty, iccdof)
ibdyty(integer)
: index of the RBDY2
iccdof(integer)
: index of the DOF to set invisible

ibdyty
(integer) : rank of a RBDY2

blmID (string) : the bulk behav ID

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : ibehav = RBDY2_GetBulkBehavNumber(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of a RBDY2

ibdyty
